titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit to employers for reimbursing the expenses of employees who provide carpooling.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit to employers for reimbursing the expenses of employees who provide carpooling.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow employers a tax credit for 50% of the first $250 paid to any employee as reimbursement for carpooling expenses.
